author: Midnight Capital LLC @Midnight_Captl
text:
The change from the @dwarkesh_sp podcast 2 months ago vs. the tweet below from @karpathy is genuinely insane

It’s a night and day difference. We went from “these models are slop and we’re 10 years away” to “I’ve never felt more behind and I could be 10x more powerful”

This all changed with Opus 4.5. It will be looked back on as a historical milestone.
